Lakefront Forest Cottages

Nestled in the heart of a dense Finnish forest our remarkable cottages provide a one-of-a-kind experience. With open access to the pristine lake, all your senses will be enveloped by nature’s embrace.
Indulge in thrilling activities such as fishing, boating, and swimming, or simply sit back, relax, and breathe in the pure air around you. Following a day of outdoor adventure, end the night with a traditional Finnish sauna experience.
Whether you’re seeking the perfect weekend getaway or a longer vacation, our cottages offer everything you need for an unparalleled and unforgettable stay. Connect with the beautiful, tranquil outdoors right on your doorstep.

Unwind with fishing, boating, and lakeside barbecues

Dip your toes in the peaceful waters and enjoy abundant lake activities. Cast your fishing line, navigate the lake by boat, and sizzle up a lakeside barbecue as the sun sets.
